segments.text: How can she just stand there drying that stupid plate while the sink floods?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is gushing everywhere, ruining the floor and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's soaked, and she doesn't even glance down—what is wrong with her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are up to no good, stealing cookies like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that ridiculous stool, about to crash and break everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl encouraging him, reaching for her share—irresponsible brats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That peaceful garden outside mocks this indoor negligence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to turn off that faucet before it destroys the place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe they're all so oblivious to the dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kind of carelessness drives me up the wall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stacked dishes will probably shatter if anyone slips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's infuriating how routine blinds them to the risks.
segments.speaker: PAR
